content: wasp nest crochet pattern by sophia orquiz level easy inspiration for pattern though it has not been scientifically proven to work many swear by decoy wasp nests to deter wasps from building nests in the area tricking them into thinking that another colony has already established its territory considering that my balcony and garage are magnets for wasps to build their nests during the warmer seasons i decided to put that theory to the test supplies h/8 5 00 mm crochet hook medium worsted weight 4 yarn acrylic 1 skein of light brown tapestry needle stitch markers scissors polyfil stuffing or scrap yarn if you do not have poly-fil on hand stuffing tool *when selecting your materials you may want to consider whether they can be washed or not terminology 2 decrease two together this is a decrease bl back loop round round st stitch sts stitches slp st slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet triple treble crochet for this pattern you will need to know how to increase and decrease stitches you will also need to know how to crochet using the back loops only the pattern consists of the single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet stitch double_crochet stitch triple crochet stitch chains and the slip stitch note this pattern will be worked in the round do not join ends round 1 create a magic_ring/ring or you may use the ch2 method as an alternative magic_ring begin with a magic_ring then work 6 single_crochet sts around it to create ring crochet over your starting tail to secure in place tighten loop by pulling on the starting tail do not join ch2 method begin with a slip knot chain 2 then work 6 single_crochet sts in 2nd chain from hook round 2 2 half_double_crochet sts in each st around 12 sts side note i like to crochet over the starting tail here as well to help secure circle increases round 3 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st = 3 sts repeat 18 sts blo round 4 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts = 4 sts repeat 24 sts round 5 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 3 sts = 5 sts repeat 30 sts blo round 6 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 sts = 6 sts repeat 36 sts round 7 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 5 sts = 7 sts repeat 42 sts blo round 8 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 6 sts = 8 sts repeat 48 sts round 9 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 7 sts = 9 sts repeat 54 sts blo round 10 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 8 sts = 10 sts repeat 60 sts side
